issue.title: [Rust] [Flight] Implement DoExchange on examples
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-8308](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8308). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The gRPC server examples in Rust require all trait members to be exhaustively implemented. The recent `DoExchange` endpoint to the Flight service is causing failures in Rust.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8308?focusedCommentId=17073215) by Ben Kietzman (bkietz):*
Issue resolved by pull request 6800
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/6800>
